remarks: Closure of the zero functional in the set of functionals with closed kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdv0cl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdv0cl.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdv0cl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdv0cl.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` C ) $.
lcdv0cl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcd0vcl $p |- ( ph -> O e. V ) $.
